title: 果然初二狗看不懂
author: haozheng
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 14-10-18 下午12:14
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: materialPureifiedCertusQuartzCrystal

replies.author: 3TUSK
replies.txt_content:
thaumicenergistics{0.6.4b} [Thaumic Energistics] (thaumicenergistics-0.6.4b.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Errored

ThaumicEnergistics是你自己加进去的吧
这个mod报错，原因我没看懂= =
解决方法是更新下神秘时代4、AE2版本到最新，如果不行再贴错误报告

replies.author: dynos01
replies.txt_content: Thaumic Energistics这个mod崩溃了，试试删除掉
